title: Need team
body: Hi i am Halomannc97 im french . i live in new caledonia next to australia . Im bronze and i search team . I can play top   mid  jg  and adc i can't play support because i don't have most supp champion mp me or add me Halomannc97

replies.body: Hey man, Im always happy to play with anyone. IGN: Gravelord
